## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G30120](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G30120)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATHMA3, HMA3</u>
- **Gene Name:** A. THALIANA HEAVY METAL ATPASE 3, heavy metal atpase 3
- **Description:**   heavy metal atpase 3;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
